headline: Set it once. Enjoy it every morning.
subheadline: The Studio's programmable settings remember exactly how you like your espresso. Dial it in once, and every morning after that is effortless precision.
hero_image_alt: Arco Studio espresso machine with walnut accents in a serene minimalist kitchen, a single perfect espresso on the drip tray, morning sunlight on white countertops, no clutter or accessories visible
description_long: The Studio is a prosumer machine, but that doesn't mean your mornings have to be complicated. Set your brew temperature, lock in your dose, save your preferred settings -- and then let the machine do what it does best. The shot timer tells you when you're in the zone, the pressure gauge confirms consistency, and the saturated group head maintains the same temperature shot after shot without any intervention. Yes, the Studio has flow profiling and advanced controls for the days when you want to explore. But for your weekday routine, it's a one-button machine that happens to pull the best espresso you've ever tasted at home. The programmable auto-on timer means it's warm and ready when your alarm goes off. Your morning stays calm. Your espresso gets extraordinary.
use_case_body: Programme the auto-on timer. Walk into the kitchen, dose your coffee, press the button. The Studio's thermal stability means your shot is consistent every single time without adjustments. Save the experimenting for the weekend -- your weekday espresso is already perfect.

social_proof_quote.quote: I was worried the Studio would be too advanced for my simple routine. It's actually the opposite -- I dialed it in once and now it makes the same incredible shot every morning on autopilot. The auto-on timer is a revelation. I just walk up and pull.
social_proof_quote.name: Nora F.
